contents.title: Written content
contents.details: Write guides, step-by-step tutorials, community documentation, JSON Schema blog posts, and beyond.

contents.title: Podcasts and Videos
contents.details: Produce educational videos, podcasts or livestreams speaking about JSON Schema.

contents.title: Give talks
contents.details: Speak at meetups and conferences; we'll help with slides, abstract submissions, and travel budget.

contents.title: JSON Schema Contributions
contents.details: Collaborate with the JSON Schema community via diverse contributions and improvements.

contents.title: Ecosystem Impact
contents.details: Promote JSON Schema adoption in other ecosystems.

contents.title: Gather Case Studies
contents.details: Collaborate in the production of case-studies.

tokens.title: Travel
tokens.details: Ambassadors are provided free entry to JSON conferences.

tokens.title: Special Swags
tokens.details: Community members recognize you by gifting you exclusive JSON Ambassador swag.

tokens.title: Workshop Swags
tokens.details: Ambassadors are gifted swag from JSON conferences and workshops.
